reviews.text: They we’re best treat me like home . They always make me smile they rock keep up go good work. Coming back soon
reviews.title: Marina and Bryan

reviews.text: My boys and I were staying next door so tried this property out.  If you go during 4-6pm happy hours there are great discounts, there is free water.  The food was great, service slightly slow, noticed our food on the benches sitting there for around 5 mins, and other pizzas came out after ours and they were delivered before ours.  Clean restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellant value

reviews.text:
The food is great and the place is clean. They do have a few arcade games for the kids in the back and kids under 2 eat free.
The manager is sweet and checked on tables a few times her self, a few of the employees stood out as great as well. 

The only thing I can recommend is allow the 2 year old a small glass with a lid for fee as well since they don’t drink much.
reviews.title: The manager Cynthia is amazing

reviews.text:
I loved their pizza, it has re fills of drinks which were great, very local feeling
The food was tasty and satisfing. They serve you the food to your table
reviews.title: Great Pizza

reviews.text: Questo locale si trova sul Sunset Boulevard,che si sa è lunghissimo, dalla parte opposta dei ristoranti alla moda ed esclusivi dove si incontrano le star del cinema quindi man mano che si percorre il viale e ci si allontana dalla zona glamour anche i locali e soprattutto i prezzi cambiano ma devo dire che abbiamo mangiato una pizza dignitosa in un locale carino, alla mano, per ragazzi e famiglie e il prezzo è stato molto competitivo considerato che per mangiare a Los Angeles anche le schifezze si spende tantissimo. La cosa positiva è che il locale si trova a meno di dieci minuti con la macchina dall'Hollywood Boulevard (walk of fame). Se volete spendere poco, mangiare una pizza discreta e poi fare una passeggiata sulla via lastricata dalle stelle ve lo consiglio
reviews.title: pizza ok

translation.text: This place is located on the Sunset Boulevard, which is known is very long, on the opposite side of the trendy and exclusive restaurants where you meet the stars of cinema so as you travel the avenue and move away from the glamorous area also the premises and above all the prices change but I must say that we have eaten a dignified pizza in a cute place, in the hand, for boys and families and the price was very competitive to eat at Los Angeles.The crap is also spent a lot.The positive thing is that the place is less than ten minutes with the car from the Hollywood Boulevard (Walk of Fame).If you want to spend little, eat a discreet pizza and then take a walk on the street paved by the stars I recommend it

reviews.text:
Wir hatten einmal eine Pizza und einmal Chicken Wings.
War alles sehr lecker und frisch zubereitet.
Getränke kann man selber nachfüllen -soviel man will.
Ambiente war super für ein typisches Essen in den USA.
reviews.title: Leckeres Essen

translation.text:
We once had a pizza and once chicken wings.
Everything was very tasty and freshly prepared.
You can refill drinks yourself -as much you want.
Ambience was great for a typical meal in the USA.
translation.title: Delicious food

reviews.text: Great Pizza.  Sauce and crust are very good. Chicken and mojo potatoes are very good when fresh. Salad bar could use improvements.
reviews.title: Great Pizza

reviews.text: I love this place if your looking for a fake pizza for fake people like CPK well this isn't Beverly Hills that's about 20 minutes west from here you can take this street directly there (Sunset Blvd) Otherwise if you can deal with a few minutes wait and don't mind everyday people and st times kids around then this place is for you, They have a section for kids and they love it (so do we lol) The employees are nothing but cool local people and are very easy to ralk to it's like were all at someones house and we all know each other, This is Holly-hood baby take it or leave it (literally) if you want to have a good tasty bad for you in so many ways but so darn good pizza then come on down!
reviews.title: My neighborhood been going here since the 1970's

reviews.text: Tastes different to what I'm used to. I had a lovely pizza with Italian sausage. My family had different things, but by far, my pizza was the best. We had to wait a while for the pizza but it was okay. I think we had to wait for about 30 min.
reviews.title: Interesting pizza

reviews.text: It was not the best pizza i've had. Wasn't bad but it wasn't overwhelmingly good either and i found it expensive ($15 for a medium sized) considering how bland it was.
reviews.title: It was OK

reviews.text: Wir haben am ersten Abend unseres L.A.-Aufenthalts das Shakeys besucht. Unser Hotel war in der Nähe, sodass wir zu Fuß gehen konnten. Nachdem wir ungewöhnlich lang die Karte studierten, kam uns eine Mitarbeiterin zu Hilfe um uns das System zu erklären. Man bestellt und zahlt an einem Tresen und bekommt das Essen dann an den Tisch geliefert. Das Getränk kann man so häufig wie man möchte selbst wieder auffüllen, genau wie den Salat, an der Salatbar. Das Essen war sehr lecker und das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis spitze. Lediglich das Besteck und Geschirr könnte mal ausgewechselt werden, denn es hat die besten Jahre hinter sich. Wir würden erneut hingehen ;).
reviews.title: Sehr Aufmerksam, gutes Preis- Leistungsverhältnis

translation.text: We visited the shakeys on the first evening of our L.A. stay.Our hotel was nearby so that we could walk.After we studied the card for an unusually long time, an employee came to help us to explain the system.You order and pay at a counter and then get the food delivered to the table.The drink can be filled in as often as you want, just like the salad, on the salad bar.The food was very tasty and the price-performance ratio was great.Only the cutlery and dishes could be replaced, because it has been the best years.We would go again;).

reviews.text: This is the best pizza I have ever had,  the atmosphere is not my favorite lots of kids usually but I can deal with it for the pizza.  I really mean it when I say it's the   WORLDS  BEST  PIZZA.
reviews.title: This is the best pizza I have ever had

reviews.text: You will ove this place the Pizza is out of this world, and the Buffo is very reasonably priced. A family place at a very reasonable price. Take the family you will be glad you did
reviews.title: Best Pizza in California and Cheap

reviews.text: Never gets old, one of the biggest reasons why i keep coming to LA, well its all over the Philippines still but you can barely find them in the states where it all began, Mojo Potatoes, thin crust pizza, im starting to figure it out that its the sauce that makes the difference, truly the best pizza in the world...Bunch of lunch from Monday to Friday(11am-2pm), a pizza buffet with drink comes up to $10.74 with tax, that includes salad bar, chicken, mojo potatoes, spaghetti, veggies, mashed potatoes i think.... cant wait to go back...
reviews.title: Best pizza in the world

reviews.text: We arrived as the lunch buffet was ending.  Manager not only agreed to leave the buffet open longer but made a few extra pizzas of our liking to ensure we all had something we liked.  It was a great lunch at a great price.  The whole family enjoyed this.
reviews.title: Great Service, Good Food

reviews.text: My family and I got the buffet. They serve salad, chicken, spaghetti,  and pizza. It was okay but not the best stuff in the world. It will do for lunch
reviews.title: Okay for lunch but nothing impressive.

reviews.text:
Small,medium and large american pizza, you can order it thin or pan.
Good.
Nice place.
reviews.title:
Small,medium and large american pizza, you can order it thin or pan.
Good.
Nice place.

restaurant.name: Shakey's Pizza Parlor
restaurant.localizedRealtimeAddress: 5170 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90027
